scripts.wt:deploy: npm run compile && npm run wt:wt:updateTask
scripts.wt:deployFresh: npm run compile && npm run wt:clean && npm run wt:createTask && npm run wt:createCron
scripts.wt:updateTask: wt update fluxfmcrawler ./build/index.js && wt cron upate
scripts.wt:clean: wt cron rm fluxfmcrawler && wt rm fluxfmcrawler
scripts.wt:serve-local: npm run clean && npm run compile && wt serve --storage-file ./wt-local/storage.json ./build/index.js
